1.0.1.en: Added toggle API Secret view in app settings. Fix API throttle issue. Fix threshold setting.

1.1.1.en: Added multiple API key support. Added key validity check on save. Added API statistics. Added manual region selection. Bug fixes.

1.1.2.en: Hotfix memory leak. Usage statistics are disabled.

1.1.3.en: Memory leak fix. Faster statistics update.
